com.google.appinventor.client.editor.simple.palette
Class SimpleComponentDescriptor

java.lang.Object
  com.google.appinventor.client.editor.simple.palette.SimpleComponentDescriptor

public final class SimpleComponentDescriptor
extends Object

Descriptor for components on the component palette panel. This class is immutable.

Constructor Summary
